This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Serializing a null registry ShadowRoot with a scoped registry host (document)
  assert_equals: expected null but got object "[object CustomElementRegistry]"
[FAIL] Serializing a scoped registry ShadowRoot with a scoped registry host (document)
  assert_equals: expected "<template shadowrootmode=\\"closed\\" shadowrootserializable=\\"\\" shadowrootcustomelementregistry=\\"\\"></template>" but got "<template shadowrootmode=\\"closed\\" shadowrootserializable=\\"\\"></template>"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
